          <title>
            <string language="sl">Dve enaki nihali</string>
            <string language="en">Two equal pendulums</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei gleiche Pendel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux pendules égaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois pêndulos iguais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due pendoli uguali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο ίσα εκκρεμή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos péndulos iguales</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Sinhrono nihanje dveh teles obešenih na vrvico in pripadajoč vektor hitrosti in sile.</string>
            <string language="en">Synchonized oscillation of two bodies appended to a spring. Observation of velocity and force of such system.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ravninsko nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">planar pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sila</string>
            <string language="en">force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">hitrost</string>
            <string language="en">velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">templates</string>
            <string language="en">templates</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Synchonized Pendelbewegung von zwei Körpern 
angefügt zu einem Frühling. Beobachtung der Geschwindigkeit 
und der Kraft solchen Systems.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Oscillation de Synchonized de deux corps ajoutés 
à un ressort. Observation de vitesse et de force d'un tel 
système.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Oscilação de Synchonized de dois corpos 
adicionados a uma mola. Observação da velocidade e da força 
de tal sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'oscillazione di Synchonized di due corpi 
collegati ad una molla. Osservazione di velocità e di forza di 
tale sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταλάντωση Synchonized δύο οργανισμών που 
επισυνάπτονται σε ένα ελατήριο. Παρατήρηση της ταχύτητας 
και δύναμη τέτοιου συστήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Oscilación de Synchonized de dos cuerpos 
añadidos al final del fichero a un resorte. Observación de la 
velocidad y de la fuerza de tal sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">planares Pendel</string>
          </keyword>
